thread.title: McDonald's all-day breakfast begins Tuesday
thread.title_full: McDonald's all-day breakfast begins Tuesday - KCTV5

author: cbs8
title: McDonald's all-day breakfast begins Tuesday
text:
(CNN) - No more racing to beat the morning clock to grab a Sausage McMuffin, biscuit or hotcakes - the fast food giant is set to roll out its breakfast menu all day long.
McDonald's customers have been clamoring for it, and now it's happening. All-day breakfast debuts nationwide on Tuesday with most menu items available.
It's a move by McDonald's to try boosting sagging sales and a response to competitors ramping up their morning menus.
The chain began testing the extended breakfast menu in March.
